MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH32 and EH39 areas of Longniddry and North Berwick, affecting properties in Ballencreif Mains and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:51pm due to repairs required to our overhead electricity network near Ballencreif Mains and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:57pm on Tuesday, 09 March 2021
